destroy_venom_syndicate_rats.name: Venom Syndicate Infestation
destroy_venom_syndicate_rats.description: Venom Syndicate pirates have been raiding our supply convoys. Eliminate the threat.
destroy_venom_syndicate_rats.briefing: Pilot, we've identified a Venom Syndicate presence in the nearby asteroid belt. Your mission is to eliminate all hostile ships. We're counting on you.

mine_dustite.name: Mining Operation
mine_dustite.description: We need raw materials for our manufacturing operations. Mine some dustite ore.
mine_dustite.briefing: We're running low on dustite. Head to the asteroid belts and bring back 1000 units.

courier_delivery.name: Urgent Delivery
courier_delivery.description: Transport important documents to our station in Kelheim.
courier_delivery.briefing: These documents contain sensitive intelligence. Deliver them to Kelheim station safely.

supply_run.name: Emergency Supply Run
supply_run.description: Our outpost needs emergency supplies. Deliver these materials quickly.
supply_run.briefing: Time is of the essence. These supplies are urgently needed at our Kelheim station.

crimson_order_patrol.name: Crimson Order Patrol
crimson_order_patrol.description: Crimson Order have been spotted near our mining operations. Drive them off.
crimson_order_patrol.briefing: A small Crimson Order patrol is harassing our miners. Show them we won't tolerate their presence.

iron_corsairs_scouts.name: Iron Corsairs Reconnaissance
iron_corsairs_scouts.description: Iron Corsairs scouts are probing our defenses. Eliminate them.
iron_corsairs_scouts.briefing: These scouts are gathering intelligence for a larger force. Take them out before they can report back.

trade_supplies.name: Supply Acquisition
trade_supplies.description: We need specific items for our operations. Acquire them from the market and deliver them to us.
trade_supplies.briefing: Pilot, our stocks of ferrium are running low. We need you to acquire 500 units of ferrium and bring them to this station. You can buy them on the market or mine and refine the ore yourself.
trade_supplies.notes: Trade missions provide better standing gains than courier or mining missions.

scenario_data_retrieval.name: Contested Data Retrieval
scenario_data_retrieval.description: A drifting cargo container in a combat zone holds valuable intel. Retrieve it while dealing with hostile NPCs.
scenario_data_retrieval.briefing: We have located a drifting cargo container at coordinates in a known pirate patrol route. The container holds encrypted data files we need. Retrieve the container and bring it back, but be warned â€” pirates are in the area.
scenario_data_retrieval.notes: Scenario missions involve retrieving items from combat zones. Caution is advised.

storyline_proving_grounds.name: Proving Your Worth
storyline_proving_grounds.description: A special mission offered by a storyline agent after completing multiple regular missions. Affects faction standing.
storyline_proving_grounds.briefing: Your consistent service has been noted by high command. We have a special operation that requires a capable pilot. This mission will significantly affect your standing with the Veyren Combine and its allies.
storyline_proving_grounds.notes: Storyline missions are offered after completing a series of regular agent missions. They affect faction standing with allies and enemies.
